overview: Mitsuo Hii's, aka P-Man, girlfriend, Kyoko, is missing. She's been altered and turned into a robot by the evil pervert Otaki-Kyō chinman. He's recruited by F Gang to fight a duel with P-Man, whose transformation circuit is destroyed and he's captured. P-Man is in mortal danger! What will happen now?
title: P-Man: Cyber Doll Zero Command
